title: Full-Stack Web Developer
shortSentence: Turning complex business flows into clean, fast web apps
summary: Full-stack developer (frontend-leaning) passionate about delivering intuitive, component-driven web applications. I work deep at the component and architecture level, take end-to-end ownership, and take pride in the quality of what I ship. Currently building a tender/procurement platform at Altura B.V. with Nuxt 4, Vue 3, and TypeScript; previous work spans ERP/CRM and B2B SaaS with Django, Laravel, Docker, and data-driven features. Comfortable with WebSockets, Elasticsearch, and PostgreSQL, and experienced in turning complex business flows into clear, fast user experiences.
